ctu_text: The objective of KYP is to which would enhance the employability skills of all aspirants who are permanent residents of Bihar and have passed at least Class 10th. The Soft Skills Training comprises Life skills, Communications Skills (English & Hindi), and Basic Computer Literacy. The training would enhance their employability. The applicant should be in the age group of 15-28 years (relaxations for ST/SC/OBC/PwD.
